bibl.title: P. Artemid.: A Palaeographer's Observations.
Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)
bibl.author: WILSON, Nigel

bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). "It seems to me that there are serious grounds for anxiety [regarding the question of authenticity]. The only suggestion I can make is that the scribe was a novice. Any suggestion that we are dealing with a luxury copy must be dismissed."
WILSON Nigel, P. Artemid.: A Palaeographer's Observations.

Kai BRODERSEN and Ja≈õ ELSNER (Edd.), Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008) = Historia. Einzelschriften. 214 (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 23-26.
